AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.subtitle: The Journey Behind the <highlight>Code</highlight>
AboutSection.opening_hook: I'm a software engineer specializing in full-stack development with a passion for building exceptional user experiences. After completing my national service in September 2025, I'm actively seeking opportunities to contribute to innovative teams. My mission is to craft digital products that are not only technically robust but also delightfully intuitive.

event2.title: Building Foundation

event3.title: Expanding Horizons
event3.description: Mastered TypeScript and modern build tools. Explored DevOps and deployment pipelines.

event4.title: Mastery Phase
event4.description: Developed complex applications with team collaboration. Deepened UI/UX design principles.

event5.title: Service & Growth

event6.title: Ready for Impact

philosophy.quote: This portfolio itself is a testament to continuous learning. Every project, every line of code, represents not just what I've built, but what I've learned along the way. I believe the best developers are perpetual studentsâ€”curious, humble, and always pushing boundaries.

drives_me.title: What Drives Me
drives_me.content: I'm driven by the challenge of turning complex problems into elegant solutions. There's nothing quite like the moment when a user interface clicks perfectly, or when clean architecture makes a codebase sing. I'm excited to join a team where I can contribute my skills while continuing to grow alongside talented engineers.
